cab.content:
THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.)
SECRET.
G.T. 3242.
WAR CABINET.
AMERICAN REPRESENTATIVE ON THE SUPREME WAR COUNCIL.
(Note by che Secretary, War Cabinet).
Information has been received from the American Ambassador in London that the United States Government has decided to take part in the Supreme War Council and that General Tasker H. Bliss who has been designated as the American representative is on the point of proceeding from the United States to Versailles.
(Sgd.) E.P.A. HANKEY.
2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
7th Januarv, 1918.
